arts.sum: Lens have been inconsistent of late, winning three and losing three of their last six league outings. Montpellier haven't fared much better and have won just twice all season. They have lost every aw...

arts.ttl: Preview: Lens vs. Montpellier HSC - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Lens and Montpellier HSC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
